metadata.title: CVE-2020-25627 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The moodlenetprofile user profile field required extra sanitizing toprevent a stored XSS risk. This affects versions 3.9 to 3.9.1. Fixed in3.9.2.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
